SpeechSynthesisEventElapsedTime.summary: The elapsedTime read-only property of the returns the elapsed time in seconds, after the started being spoken, at which the event was triggered.
SpeechSynthesisEventElapsedTime.value:
A float containing the elapsed time, in seconds.
NOTENote: Early versions of the specification required the elapsed time in milliseconds.
